titlestmt.titleproper: Lynes, George Platt, 1907-1955. George Lynes Platt photographs, 1935-1953 (MS Thr 483): Guide.

change.item: hou01715 converted by Harvard University Library OIS from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.xsl (sy2006-06-08).

titlepage.titleproper: Lynes, George Platt, 1907-1955. George Lynes Platt photographs, 1935-1953: Guide.
titlepage.author: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library
titlepage.p: Â© 2005 The President and Fellows of Harvard College

did.repository: Harvard Theatre Collection, Houghton Library, Harvard College Library, Harvard University
did.abstract: Photographs by the American photographer George Platt Lynes.

bioghist.p: Lynes worked in New York as a fashion photographer for Vogue and Harper's Bazaar and took photographs for Lincoln Kirstein and George Balanchine of the dancers and productions of the American Ballet. He also staged and photographed a series of male nudes.

scopecontent.p: Photographs of fashion models and American Ballet dancers, portraits of W. H. Auden, George Balanchine, Paul Cadmus, Alexandra Danilova, Oskar Kokoschka, and self-portraits.

note.p: Shirtless man blowing fog into the air with opossum, raccoon, and rabbit.
With Tamara Geva and William Dollar. Geva, wearing dark dress, facing back and wrapped horizontally around Dollar. Dollar, nude, facing front with head bent down, wrapped vertically around Geva.

did.unittitle: "Orpheus and Eurydice," choreography by George Balanchine, New York, 1936.

note.p: Two male nudes dancing with Noguchi sculpture; back reads "Collection of Paul Cadmus."

did.unittitle: "Picnic at Tintagel," choreography by George Balanchine.

note.p: Seven characters having a picnic at Tintagel; costumes by Beatod.
Nude man in fetal position lying on a platform; the platform rests on a set of nude legs and buttocks, severed at the hip.
Reaching into trash can, facing front.
Reaching into trash can, facing right.
Shirtless, lying on pillow, arms crossed over head; found with Bill Bailey photographs, but back reads Jimmy Daniels.
Standing, his right leg crossed over his left, arms spread wide, torso angled left, smiling.
Standing, shirtless, his left hand on the face of a mannequin.
Facing front; back reads "Russell L. has a better one."

Balanchine in center, wearing suit, not smiling, his arms around Magellanes at left and Pelus at right; Magellanes and Pelus nude, smiling, facing in towards Balanchine and looking out at camera. Printed by Alix Jeffry from a negative by Lynes.
Standing in a meadow, her arms reaching up for the branches of a tree, smiling.
Standing en pointe, dressed in ballet tutu with flower in her hair, standing situated adjacent to verso of a huge, framed canvas with light behind canvas.
Standing, his right profile, shirtless, eyes closed.
Seated, leaning forward, hands over the bottom of face, looking forward and up.
Seated, looking down and left, with cigarette and ragged sweater.
Leaning against papered wall, wearing ragged sweater and looking down, left, with hands behind back.
Seated, with head in the middle of a skull.
Seated, nude, his right leg crossed over to the left, his right arm outstretched and his left arm resting on his head.

did.unittitle: Cadmus, Paul, George Platt Lynes's studio, 1942.

note.p: Asst. Jonathan Tichenor at camera; Cadmus seated on platform, his right hand on his right thigh, his left hand on platform.

did.unittitle: Cadmus, Paul, George Platt Lynes's studio, 1942.

note.p: Asst. Jonathan Tichenor at camera; Cadmus reclining on platform, his right knee bent, his left elbow and right hand on platform and his left hand at his chin.
Leaning his head on his right hand, seated, trees in background.
Seated on table with both hands in pockets.
Number on photograph: LA 282 G-8; Kodak Safety 10.
Seated at table with his left arm and right hand resting on tabletop, watch visible.
Number on photograph: LA 282 G-1; Kodak Safety 10.
Seated on table with both hands at his sides resting on the tabletop.
Number on photograph: LA 282 G-7; Kodak Safety 10.
Standing on beach with three black dogs.
Seated with legs crossed Indian style, his chin in his left hand, shirtless, facing front; three statue heads in bottom right corner.
Reclining on couch, shirtless, his left leg crossed under his right leg, facing front.
Seated on table, shirtless, body facing right and looking at camera; four Vogue magazines visible in front of him.
Wearing painting overalls, hands in pockets, looking left.
Holding a bouquet of metal roses.
Seated, wearing dark dress shirt and light pants, body facing right, looking at camera.
Seated, looking over back of chair towards upper right.
Leaning on ladder (?) with left hand on frame, another hand (his right?) visible in silhouette. .
Seated in director's chair, looking up, right; hand crossed at wrist on back of chair.
Seated in chair, looking left, his left thumb hooked inside his shirt.
Lying down next to wall with hands on waist.
Lying down next to wall, shirtless, hands on waist.
Seated in canvas chair next to high wall.
Wearing dark dress with gingham detail, seated, facing right, her right elbow on her knee and her right hand at her chin.
In office, seated on chair with arms crossed, smoking a cigarette.
Posed on cushion, with her shadow on a screen behind her.
Standing next to painting with curtain behind her.
"Danilova in Hollywood;" Danilova leaning against railing in a foyer with ivy-covered walls; dress by Adrien.
Standing in doorway, arms at sides, looking up left; words "(t)rattoria" and "pesce" visible on the worn wall she leans against.
On wooden porch, body facing right, leaning back with arms crossed across chest, eyes closed; phrase "Adriaen --- of Amsterdam" visible on wall behind her; three windows at top of photograph.
Stepping out of doorway of brick building, body facing right, leaning back, arms raised above head in fifth position.
In sequined gown looking up at a woman wrapped in a white curtain.
In sailor suit and hat; also wearing peacoat with collar turned up; shadow visible on white background.
In sailor suit with hands on thighs; shadow visible on white background.
Holding pole above head, wearing white scarf, two photographs in his right hand.
Wearing all white, standing with hands on hips against a bare wall.
Standing with hands on hips, wearing white sweatshirt.
Standing with hands on hips, wearing black turtleneck, looking left.
Seated on white floor in empty space, wearing white pants and no shirt or shoes, legs crossed and body facing forward with elbows on knees, looking left.
Seated on floor, his lower body facing left with legs in front of him, his upper body twisted to the back, with weight supported by his right arm.
Wearing black sweater, looking up and right. Pavel Tchelitchev's portrait of George Platt Lynes dominates background.
Number on photograph. Number on print incorrect.
Seated on couch with both hands on her temples.
Seated in chair with cigarette, looking left; smaller than other proofs.
Standing, hands on hips against bare white background, wearing a cap, looking up and left.
Standing, hands on hips against bare white background, wearing a cap, looking down.
Seated agains white background so that his right profile is visible.
Reclining on patterned floor with arms behind him, looking left.
Standing, hands on hips against a bare white background, looking up right.
Lying on his stomach, wearing cuffed jeans, propped on elbows, his head in the upper left of photograph.
Facing back, twisted around to show right profile of his face, his right leg bent behind him in foreground.
Facing right, seated on ground, grasping ankles.
Crouched and facing forward, wearing socks, cuffed jeans, white undershirt, and cap; his right elbow on his right knee.
"Brahms Variations;" dancer, wearing ballet costume, in fifth position, looking left.
"Brahms Variations;" dancer, wearing crown, looking up.
Contact sheet; various poses in room with bulletin board and American Airlines poster; back reads "Proof. Property of Vogue Studios, 480 Lexington Ave. New York City;" six circled X's on back.

Contact sheet; various poses seated at desk by window; back reads "Proof. property of Vogue Studios, 480 Lexington Ave. New York City;" on back, square is drawn around 14251 LA 37 and letters MW are marked in center; letters MW are also on the front of 14251 LA 37.
Woman's face covered by wet paper, her nose sticking though the near-transparent material.
Sillhouette of woman's head in bottom right of photo, her hair spread over a tree trunk covered in vines which runs diagonally across the photo.
Nude facing back in studio setup of living room, hands clasped behind her; very dark light; photo has wrinkled and browned on reverse.
Headshot, leaning against headrest draped with a towel.
Seated, holding folded newspaper, wearing polka-dot scarf.
Fashion portrait; wearing fur coat, looking left, profile.
In striped dress, her right knee bent and her right foot on platform, her right hand on her hip, holding cigarette in her left hand, blowing out smoke.
Reading an anatomy book while seated in front of three illustrations of man's vascular system.
Holding an anatomical illustration in front of his right side of his face while standing in front of two partial illustrations of man's vascular system; back reads "pajama (group)."
Standing in front of two illustrations of man's vascular system; wrapped in a poncho and looking down right; back reads "A."
Leaning in a doorframe in right profile, hair down over her shoulders; 2 relief figures on walls, an orator one with tragic mask.
Standing by window wearing all white, with his left hand in his pocket and his right hand hooked over his waistband.
Sitting outside of window with arms crossed on windowsill.
Sitting outside of window with arms crossed on windowsill; his right elbow is slightly farther down on the windowsill than in HTC 20,674.
Looking right with eyes cast down, her left arm thrust diagonally up left across her face, her right arm pointing horizontally across her body to the right.

Seated at table with arms crossed on tabletop, looking right; back reads: "Hear you are interested in Kay Thompson act for St Regis think it sensational hear it has doubled [illegible]'s business do grab it if you can love Lynes."
Seated at table, facing front, his left hand in a fist on his chin and his right hand resting on table holding a cigarette.
Seated at table, smiling, with his right arm at a diagonal across his body, his right hand holding a cigarette; damage to proof at lower left.
Number on photograph: LA 281 G-8; Kodak Safety 10.
Seated at table, his left elbow propped on the table and his left hand in a fist at his chin, smiling.
Seated at table, both elbows propped on table, his cheek resting in his right hand, looking up.
Reclining on lounge chair, holding cigarette in hie left hand, his right hand behind his head.
Facing front with pipe in mouth.
Seated on rock with ocean visible in background, looking right.
Seated on pole with rocks and ocean behind, sweater around neck, holding cigarette in his right hand.
Standing in front of white screen, holding back of filigree chair; damage to middle left of proof.

did.unittitle: Harrison, Barbara (later Mrs. Lloyd Wescott); Lynes, George Platt,France, 1928.

note.p: At the beach; Lynes holding Harrison in a headlock, both smiling.
Standing to the left side of a large white cloth hanging from the ceiling, his right foot forward, another man's back is visible in the background.
Standing amidst strips of white fabric hung from the ceiling, hands on hips.
Sitting on bench in courtyard, looking right.
Seated behind large concrete slab, with both hands resting on either side of it; in studio of some sort with two men conversing in background.
Seated on large concrete slab, hands gripping the edges, his shadow cast behind him.
Seated in director's chair, umbrella to his right; two men talking in background next to two light racks.
Leaning with his right hand against window frame, left thumb hooked under his belt, facing slightly right.
Leaning with his right hand against window frame, left thumb hooked under his belt, facing full front.
Sitting in front of cracked white wall, angled slightly left.
Sitting in front of cracked white wall, facing full front.
Viewed from outside of house, looking out of window, facing camera.
Seated, looking left, hands in pockets, cloud background visible at right.
Seated in chair with both arms resting fully on armrests, looking right, cigarette in his left hand.
Seated, his left elbow on armrest and his right arm in his lap, facing forward, cigarette in his left hand.
View from the elbows up, looking right, wooden frame fills left third of photo.
Seated, looking right, his left elbow on armrest and his left hand at his throat.
Seated, facing camera, upper body in shadow.
Seated on windowsill, his arms resting on a sawhorse, his right hand over his chin/mouth.
Seated on sawhorse in front of window, his left leg spread over the length of the sawhorese, looking left.
Headshot in golden-brown tone with his right hand over the bottom of his face, looking forward.
Seated in canvas chair with both hands on the tips of the armrests, looking left, wearing polka-dotted bow tie; slight damage to upper right edge of photo.
Seated in ornate chair, body facing left, looking forward and slightly up at camera, his left leg crossed over his right leg.
Seated and facing forward, his elbows resting on armrests and his hands clasped together, light emanating from behind his head.
Kirstein standing in front of Cadmus; both facing front and looking right; Kirstein wearing large cross around her neck.
Seated, face resting in his right palm, his left hand on his torso, his right leg propped up, looking left; original manila folder reads "Glen Wescott."
Seated on platform, reclining on his left elbow, his hands clasped, his right knee bent, looking left. Kirstein was director of the American Ballet.
Leaning with his elbows against fan, his left hand at his temple, looking right.
Leaning with his elbows against fan, his left hand at his temple, looking front.
His right hand resting on top of his left hand, both hands on top of fan, looking right.
His left elbow resting on fan with his left index finger pointed up, his right hand on hip, looking forward and slightly up.
Standing, his left hand resting on stool, his right hand in his pocket, looking forward.
Waist-up shot; seated on chair, looking right.
Seated in room with open window and a painting, legs propped on a table, someone else's legs mingling with his on tabletop (second person's face and body not visible).
Seated in room with closed window and a painting, angled in chair to look at painting.
In Indian costume, wearing ornate headdress, seated in front of greenery, body facing left; eyes shut, his right thumb at lips.
In ruffled leotard and slippers, seated with left leg bent under. Right leg outstretched, leaning on left arm with right arm bent and raised.
Leaning with her elbows on the back of a bench, looking at a flower in her right hand.
Nude, standing facing back, looking left.
Nude, lying on her stomach on platform covered with a painter's drip cloth.
Nude, lying on her back on a raised platform covered with a painter's drip cloth.
In fur-lined coat with hand on bookshelf, facing right.
Camera hoisted over head, both arms raised in circular shape.
Camera hoisted over head, his left arm higher than his right.
Camera above head, his left hand on trigger and his right hand resting on a piece of wood.
Camera at shoulder level, his right arm propped on the box, circular lights on left side of proof.
Camera at shoulder level, his left hand on the trigger, circular lights on left side of proof.
Camera above head, his right hand raised, looking down and to our right.
Camera above head, his left hand on trigger and his right hand with fingers spread wide on a piece of wood; of his face only eyes and the bridge of his nose are visible.

Contact sheet; various poses shirtless on large bed; second proof up from bottom in far right column is marked to be cut; back reads "80.00 60.94" and "je ne coucoir avenue superiorite, que la bonte #."
Wearing button-up khaki shirt with the sleeves rolled up, his left hand at waist, his right hand holding a cigarette to his mouth, head tilted slightly left.
Wearing button-up khaki shirt with the sleeves rolled up, his hands at sides, looking forward.
Seated on floor in family-room-type area, legs crossed, baby in lap, both Lynes and baby sitting straight up and looking at camera.
Seated on floor in family-room-type area, legs crossed, baby in lap; baby crawling over Lynes' right knee and looking at camera, Lynes leaning to left and smiling at baby.
Seated on couch in living room, wearing suit and tie, looking slightly left, smiling.
Seated on couch in living room, wearing suit and tie, looking slightly left, not smiling.
Camera looking up at Lynes from knee-level at a steep angle; Lynes standing in front of ornate building (church?) and looking left.
Lynes in white bathing trunks ar beach, standing in front of a sand dune, hands at sides, looking right and squinting.
Lynes and another man sitting back-to back on a rock; behind them, what looks like a Southwestern church.
Sunset at the beach; a man and a woman holding a sheet behind Lynes, who, shirtless, is raising his arms and looking up towards the sky.
Lynes and another man at the beach; Lynes seated and looking to his left, smiling at a small dog; the other man standing with his hands on Lynes' shoulders, smiling at camera.
Undersized photograph (approximately 4-3/4" by 6-1/2"); Lynes and a nother man in a garden; other man crouching down amidst plants, Lynes standing behind him with hands on hips.
Lynes and another man at the beach; Lynes seated and looking to his left, smiling at a small dog; the other man seated to the left of Lynes, petting the dog.
View of Lynes from the shoulders up lying in a bed of leaves and cradling a small dog.
Lynes standing in front of a tree and slightly behind a stone urn with vines, his left profile from the waist up contained mostly in the bottom right quadrant of the photo.
Sitting on couch in living room, looking out window to the left; holding a cigarette in his right hand and a pair of glasses in his left hand.
Seated, elbows on knees, left profile, shirtless, outdoors, people in background.
Seated, elbows on knees, left profile, shirtless, outdoors, people in background; identical to HTC 20,806 except for damage spots in the center of photo.
Standing on porch with woman, leaning against column and facing right (towards building), woman leaning against the column behind him and also facing right.
Young Lynes wearing denim jacket, viewed from the waist up, eyes cast down to bottom left.
Seated in bare room (appears to be studio or basement), wearing dress coat, vest, and tie, his right hand clasping his left wrist, looking left.
View from the shoulders up, leaning against brick wall, his right arm raised above his head, looking up, face mostly obscured.
Lynes seen through two torn canvas screens; standing, arms crossed, with cigarette in his right hand.
Viewed from shoulders up, his right shoulder and face facing the camera, looking behind him (to the left); black background; undersized photograph (approx. 7.5" by 9").
Contact sheet: 16 proofs taken at the beach.
In Harlequin tights (full length) with right arms raised, hand behind head, left arm raised with hand on forehead, large ring worn palm-side.
Number on photograph: Negative No. 239 A.
Lying in a pile of leaves with rake, facing forward.
Sitting at desk, eyeglasses in his right hand, arms on desk, looking right.
Sitting at desk, eyeglasses in his right hand, arms on desk, looking left.
Sitting at desk, wearing eyeglasses; Lynes' figure contained in bottom left quandrant of photo.
Standing with hands in pockets, facing front and looking right; figure contained in left half of photo.
Seated on ladder, her arms wrapped around it, looking right.

Unidentified male nude in George Platt Lynes' bedroom; man is mostly hidden behind bed, only his arms and head visible as they are resting on the bed, hands clasped; bedside lamp turned on directly above figure.
Leaning against palm tree, facing forward, arms crossed, facing forward, looking forward.
Leaning against palm tree, hat in hand, facing left, looking slightly forward, small smile.
Leaning against palm tree, hat in hand, facing left, looking full forward, lip spursed.
Seated on bench by pond next to olarge black dog; looking left.
Man in white undershirt seated in front of shadowed blinds.
Lying on carpet, only head visible; crease down center.
Seated on bed, wearing all white, looking right; back reads "H.S. H.R.J."
Twice-exposed photograph of dancer, facing front.
Twice-exposed photograph of dancer, facing back.
Dance study; silver print; weight on his right leg, his left toe pointed, his left hand touching his left thigh, looking right; back of proof marked with the letter F.
Dance study; silver print; both arms spread straight, looking left; back of proof marked with the letter F.
Dance study; silver print; both arms raised and bent, looking right; back of proof marked with the letter F.
Seated with his right leg bent, wearing bathrobe, looking left; silver print.
Seated, wearing bathrobe around shoulders, frontally nude, looking right; silver print;.
Seated, wearing bathrobe, facing front with hands on hips; silver print.
Seated, arms crossed across chest, not wearing pants.

unittitle.persname: Model (Arthur Lee's model with shadow of Robert Bishop),

note.p: Nude woman standing with her leg in torn canvas screen, shadow of Robert Bishop visible on wall behind her.
Reclining on couch, viewed from shoulders up, left third of face obscured by pillow.
Young, seated, with fingers on cheek.
Seated, with blurred botanical background, facing front.
Seated, with gray background, chin slightly raised; number 150-19 is scratched out at top of proof.
With blurred botanical background, looking left, her left hand gripping her right wrist.
Seated, with gray background, chin slightly lowered.
Seated on back of chair, with her right hand in her lap.
Standing by hedge with gloves clasped in her right hand.
Seated, looking forward with unbuttoned cape and gloves clasped in her right hand.
Standing against wall, holding gloves, looking up right.
Seated, looking forward, wearing unbuttoned cape, holding glove in her left hand.
Seated in armchair, leaning against right arm of chair, her left hand at her collar and her right hand holding a glove.
Seated in armchair, leaning against right arm of chair, her left hand at her neck and her right hand holding a glove.
Standing against wall, holding gloves, looking up left.

Seated against blank background, looking forward and slightly left, her light dress visible under dark jacket, wearing hat decorated with semicircular bows, holding white gloves, a number of pencilled markings on back of photo.
Standing, leaning against drafting table beside half-open window.
In office, seated with her left elbow on desk, looking left.
Standing in fifth position in front of white cutout background, wearing ballet costume, looking up.
Dancer, in ballet costume, seated and looking down, her arms draped over her left leg towards the bottom right of photo.
By pool, in white swim trunks, looking down at stone floor.
Seated in canvas chair under tent-like canopy of wrinkled cloth, an empty canvas chair at left, a man (visible from shoulders down) walking out of the picture at right.
In studio setup with wrinkled paper hanging overhead, holding a piece of the same material to his chest to cover his entire body except for arms and head.
Seated, in black dress, looking left.
Seated, leaning against wall, facing right, hands clasped around knees.
Wearing dress shirt and tie, arms raised and crossed on top of head, facing front.
Shown from elbows up, facing front, wearing dress shirt and tie, tie tucked into shirt.
Seated on chair against blank background, facing front, hands in lap, his right foot resting on chair rung.
Matted photo; Platt standing with his knee on table, to the left of a curtain, a door slightly ajar behind him.
Standing beside bed frame, floor strewn with newspapers, smiling.
Seated on bed frame, floor strewn with newspapers, looking left.
Sitting on couch, wearing striped skirt, holding doll's head, her right arm extended, her head turned left, eyes closed.
With two paintings of Monroe Wheeler by Pavel Tchelitchev; wearing dark dress and looking right.
Wearing white halter top, leaning on chair back from behind, looking up right.
Wearing black ball gown, seated and leaning against wall with flower bouquet in foreground.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Standing on balcony in white dress, looking front, smiling.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Sitting on steps in white dress, her right hand on her left knee, facing front, smiling.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Standing on steps in white dress, hands raised in front of her, looking right.
Sitting in chair in black dress, looking right, flowered wallpaper on wall behind her.
Sitting in chair in black dress, looking right and front (at an angle), flowered wallpaper on wall behind her.
Undersized photograph (approx. 7 7/16" by 7 7/16"); sitting in wicker chair, arms raised, looking up, smiling.
Undersized photograph (approx. 7 3/4" by 7 10/16"); outside, looking left at house under renovation, arms behind back.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne; Lynes, George Platt, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Porter standing on balcony in white dress, looking left; Lynes standing at ground level, leaning against wall with back to camera, looking up at Porter, arms crossed above head.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne; Lynes, George Platt, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Porter standing on balcony in white dress, looking front, smiling; Lynes standing at ground level, facing camera, holding leaf.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne; Lynes, George Platt, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Porter standing on balcony in white dress, looking front; Lynes kneeling at ground level, looking front.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne; Lynes, George Platt, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Porter standing on balcony in white dress, looking left; Lynes kneeling at ground level, looking left.

did.unittitle: Porter, Katherine Anne; Lynes, George Platt, Exterior of Lynes's Hollywood home, 1947.

note.p: Porter standing on balcony in white dress, looking left; Lynes standing at ground level, leaning against wall with back to camera, looking down, arms above head.
Looking out window frame, arms crossed, looking down.
Looking out window frame, his right arm on his left arm and his left arm on the window frame, looking left and slightly down.
Wearing dress pants, dress shirt, and tie; sitting on ground leaning against riser, looking down and left.
Wearing V-neck sweater, seated with hands in pockets, looking up left.
Wearing V-neck sweater, seated with his left leg propped up and his left elbow resting on left knee, holding his right index finger in his left hand, looking right.
Reclining on platform, weight supported by his left arm, wearing all white, looking at camera.
Reclining on platform, weight supported by his left arm, shirtless, looking left.
Head shot, lying on blank white backdrop, shirtless, looking down, face contained in bottom half of photograph.
Head shot, lying on carpet, facing right, shirtless, head fills the bottom half of photo.
Seated at table, facing left, his left arm resting on table slightly behind a paper chain, holding a baseball; tear, approximately 1" long, on right edge.
Bust-length in center of frame, wearing cap-sleeved blouse and white gloves, looking right.
Seated, looking up; orange damage spots.
Seated, wearing heavily draped brocade and large cuff bracelets, looking front with left hand raised, palm out.
Seated on couch with elbows resting on the back of couch; facing front, looking left.
Seated in armchair in living room, facing and looking right, his right hand supporting chin.
Leaning against window on left side of frame.
Nude man lying flat on back with arms raised above head on left side of photograph; textured appearance.
Standing, his left hand in pocket and his right hand holding a triangle, looking up left.
Note on folder: "This is really Paul Cadmus - enczafran(?) Dec 18 '03."
Headshot, viewed from the elbows up, facing forwards and looking slightly right.
View of face, right profile, river and trees in background.
View from elbows up, looking right, river and trees in background.
Profile of Steinberg facing left in front of drawing of man riding horse.
Sitting on porch, his left leg crossed over his right leg, looking forward and up.
Standing on porch, leaning on pole to his left, hands in pockets, looking slightly right.
Sitting on porch, his left leg crossed over his right leg, looking forward.
Contact sheet; various poses on porch with numerous botanicals.
Undersized photograph (approximately 6-1/4 by 5-3/8"); Christmas card; George Platt Lynes studio wall, c. 1952, painted for background by Bernard Perlin; back reads "with love Une Geo."
Undersize photograph of heavily graffitied studio wall.
View from elbows up which occupies whole of photograph; left quarter of face is blurred out.
At work on a portrait of George Platt Lynes, painting, visible on left half of photograph, facing left; gelatin silver print 24 x 19 cm;.
Seated against partial wall, bones on top of wall, looking left.
Seated with right arm on arm of chair. Dressed in dotted dressing gown? Looking slightly left.
In military uniform; view of Tichenor from the elbows up occupies bottom right quadrant of photo; the rest of the space is occupied by a cage-like structure.
Facing back and looking right, arms crossed, wearing sleeveless undershirt, view from hips up.
Seated, leaning slightly back, wearing white undershirt and shorts, holding cigarette in his right hand, looking forward.
View from the hips up, leaning against wall, arms crossed, wearing white undershirt, looking down and right.
Leaning against wall in white dress.
Standing, looking down and left, wearing triangular hat, holding a corner of her apron out to her left with her right hand, her right hand at her waist with palm facing upwards.
Bald man in overcoat, viewed from the elbows up, seated, looking right.
Man and woman viewed from waist up, both facing right, man holding a small tray with leaves in it.
Man wearing white sweatshirt and jeans, standing against white wall, hands in pockets, viewed full front.
Man wearing white sweatshirt and jeans, standing against white wall, wooden scaffolding obscuring the view.
Young girl (approx. age 10) standing behind white chair, looking right.
Young girl (approx. age 10) seated, her chin on her hands, facing camera.

Mother and child, both nude; mother facing back, seated on knees; child on her shoulders, facing left. Photo by J. Russell Lynes (J.R. Lynes, Shipley School,Bryn Mawr, Penn.), Rolleiflex 6x6, on Agfa Superpan Press.
Shirtless man reclining on grass, striped shirt tied around his neck, smiling; book, sunglasses, and container of film in foreground.
Shirtless man leaning against tree, striped shirt tied around his neck, hands behind back, looking right; grassy park in background.
Leaning against carpet roll, his chin in his right hand, facing front.
Straddling carpet roll, hands on knees, facing front, smiling.
In profile, facing left, face obscured, shirtless, holding on to window frame with right hand, hill with houses in background.

Two black bars divide photograph horizontally into thirds; in top third, head visible, looking up left with mouth open. In bottom two thirds, body and shadow of body visible in sillhouette, but details obscured.
Standing in field, looking up and shading eyes with his right hand; shirtless, holding shirt over his left arm.
Shirtless man kneeling at bedside, hands folded on bed and head resting between arms with eyes closed.
Man in white T-shirt seated before shutter-paneled folding doors. Arms folded across chest, looking front.
Mounted, undersized print; young man, shirtless and seated before angled mirrors, looking up and forward.

list.item: 1. Man in calf-length white tights leaning with his left elbow on pole (barre?), facing left.
2. Close-up on man in tights' buttocks and thighs.
3. Man in tights from behind, leaning with both arms stretched along pole and right ankle crossed over left.
4. Man in tights seated, looking right, with left knee up.
5. Man in tights' torso and thighs form an 'L' on Left and bottom of photograph.

note.p: Man in gingham boxer shorts kneeling in patterned-fabric, with hands held behind back, looking up.
Neck, torso, and pelvis of a nude man; grainy quality.
Undersized photo (approximately 8-3/4 by 6-1/2"); man dressed in cape, embroidered vest, loose pants, and cap with hands on hips, looking forward.
Undersized photo (approximately 8-3/4 by 6-1/2"); man dressed in cape, loose pants, and cap with arms spread wide to fan out cape, looking forward and up.
Man dressed in cape, embroidered vest, loose pants, and cap with his right arm extended to spread out the cape; looking up left; back reads "dancer of the Casino de Paris,Paris."
Seated on couch in living room, holding small dog, smiling at camera.
Seated on windowsill in living room with feet on couch, legs crossed, looking down right.
Seated in study with his right elbow on table, body angled right, smoking cigar.
Seated in study with arms crossed on desk, smoking cigar.
Body facing forward, his left elbow on desk and his left hand holding a cigar to his lips.
Seated on filigree couch, facing front, wearing dress with lace collar.
Seated on desk, hands clasped, facing forward.
Seated on desk, hands clasped, looking left.
Seated on chair, his left arm resting on desk, smiling.
Seated on chair, his left arm resting on desk, leaning forward in chair, his right hand clenched in his lap.
Seated, looking forward, hands clasped in lap, almost identical to HTC 20-726 except that hands are slightly more shadowed and definition is less precise.
Seated, looking forward, hands clasped in lap, almost identical to HTC 20-725 except that hands are slightly less shadowed and definition is more precise.
Seated, looking right, his right eye slightly narrowed as if incredulous.
Seated, looking right, both eyes wide open as if alert.
Undersized photograph (approximately 5 by 8"); appears to be photograph of proof; Wescott lying on white towel and wrapped in white terrycloth bathrobe, looking right, viewed from the shoulders up.
Undersized photograph (approximately 5 by 8"); appears to be photograph of proof; Wescott reclining on bed, propped against pillows, facing and looking right, his right hand on chin.
Wescott standing outdoors, leaning against dead tree; meadow and male nude in background.

did.unittitle: Wescott, Glenway;Lynes, George Platt (?), Mulhocaway River, N.J., 1940.

note.p: Both nude in river, near small waterfall, Wescott standing facing camera, Lynes seated facing back, trees and grasses in background.
Shirtless man with goatee viewed from the waist up, arms slightly spread out, looking right.
Wearing black T-shirt and black pants, facing front, arms spread out; leaning against some sort of industrial wall.
Undersized photograph (approx. 7 11/16" by 7 10/16"); in doorway, holding cigarette in his right hand, looking left.
View from shoulders up, standing by barn door, facing camera, smiling.
Seated on a hay bale, looking front.
Seated on a hay bale, looking right.
With cows, crouched down near barn floor, he behind her.
Seated on haystack, in profile, he behind her with his hands on her shoulders, both smiling.
Standing with barn door in background, facing each other, her arm on his shoulder.
Seated with barn door in background, facing right, she holding a cigarette.
He standing by barn door, looking down; she in profile at bottom left, looking left.
One man, standing and facing back, lighting a kneeling man's cigarette.
One man standing, facing back with arms crossed; another man kneeling, his left hand holding a hankerchief to his face and his right hand holding a cigarette.
Leaning against wall with thumbs under pants waistline.
Standing in corridor with hands in pockets, smiling ahead at camera.
Seated with face resting on her left hand, looking left.
Seated on filigree couch, looking right, small dog in her lap.
Two men in sailor suits, with driftwood, looking at each other.
Man in sailor suit, with driftwood, looking forward.
Seated on floor, his right leg propped up, his right arm holding his jacket over his shoulder, his shadow visible on the wall behind him.
View from the elbows up which occupies bottom 2/3 of photo; looking right and slightly up; back reads "Donald Windham 23/ 5 St Luke Place/ Ph. 3-6188."
Shirtless, leaning against back of chair; handwritten X in lower right-hand corner.
Contact sheet: 16 proofs taken under a tree.
In hammock, looking forward, A. Jenson Yow (ex Morgan Library Conservator).
Nude man, seated and looking back left, with his right arm on his right thigh.
